title: JOIN THE CHAT ROOM 'Pool Party' LIKE SO MANY MORE CAN JOIN!!
body:
How to join a chat room:
1. Do you see where there is a picture of 2 people and its displaying your friends? click the tab on the right of that. 
2. Now click the folder on the bottom.
3. A search comes up type in 'Pool Party.'
4. Join and earn points!

replies.body: {{champion:421}}  has a jet skiiiiiiiiiiii auto win
